pr_title: TSK-1466: Fix bug in sort component

timeline.message: TSK-1466: fix bug in sort component

timeline.author: sofie29

timeline.bodyText: We have to consider that different components are using the sort component. The other components (workbasket-list-toolbar and task-list-toolbar) pass the defaultSortBy via the @ Input. I prefer adding the input in the access-items-management.component.html: <taskana-shared-sort [sortingFields]="sortingFields" (performSorting)="sorting($event)" [defaultSortBy]='"access-id"' instead of changing the default value in the sortComponent itself.
timeline.author: sofie29
